description: Building the Mercor Work Platform, an AI-powered talent marketplace
Built a survey system that helped thousands of users give feedback, driving product insights
Created an availability collection system for contractors that helped the company make better decisions on talent allocation
Improved code quality through better testing and code review standards
Built location and work authorization collection flows for better user verification
Added phone verification as a fraud signal to improve platform security
Built Employee Identity Management solutions
Led product development and technical architecture decisions
Provided services to clients while building our own products
Drove strategic vision for next-gen identity solutions
Worked on Frappe Cloud, mainly on infrastructure automation and AWS management
Added support for custom domains, email, and DNS configurations
Made developer experience improvements for Frappe Cloud and Framework users
Built a dynamic AI Agent Platform and an AI Course Generation Platform
Set up infrastructure for deploying edge apps on multiple providers
Built AI web apps including a voice survey platform
Developed AI agents for various clients from scratch
Built the first version of Plazza's Quick Commerce system
Made a WhatsApp Bot medicine delivery system for the APR region
Implemented infrastructure and backend solutions
Built microservices using NestJS, RabbitMQ, and PostgreSQL
Used AWS services like EC2, EKS, Amazon MQ, and RDS
Built dataset parsing algorithms for LoRA training data for LLMs like Vicuna-13b and LLaMa-2-7b
Made methods to streamline fine-tuning of diffusion models on faces
Built interactive AI-first chat playground UIs
Built CRM web apps by connecting multiple feedback and customer sources
Made proofs of concept for multi-threaded Node backends
Worked with teams of 7+ people
Managed dev teams with 10+ people
Created the org's mission and vision statements
Built and contributed to 12+ OSS projects
Taught NodeJS and TypeScript to community members
